sentences.en: "I think the earlier ones are a lot better." —"Mm, definitely."
sentences.cn: “我觉得早前的那些要好得多。”——“嗯，毫无疑问。”

sentences.en: A typical lens has a focal length ( f ) of 625 mm.
sentences.cn: 常见镜头的焦距 ( f ) 为625毫米.

sentences.en: At a length of 25 mm the distribution is bimodal.
sentences.cn: 长度为2.5mm时,分布是双峰形.

sentences.en: Height: 210 mm. Width: 57 mm. Length: 170 mm.
Large diameter wafers are feasible and 200 - mm wafers have been produced.
sentences.cn: 大直径片子已不难制造,200mm的片子也已产生了.

sentences.en: Mm, I know what you mean.
Rainfall averages out in this part of the country at 800 mm a year.
sentences.cn: 我国这个地区的年平均降雨量为800毫米.

sentences.en: Riyadh got 25 mm of rain in just 12 hours.
sentences.cn: 利雅得在12小时内降水就达25毫米。

sentences.en: The annual rainfall in this area was less than 50 mm last year.
sentences.cn: 本地区去年的降雨量不足50毫米.

sentences.en: The machine is capable of processing 500 mm square plates very uniformly.
sentences.cn: 这种机器可用来冲洗500毫米见方的底片,并得到很均匀的效果.

sentences.en: The rainfall average s 800 mm . a year.
sentences.cn: 平均每年降雨量为800毫米.

sentences.en: The rainfall averages 1000 mm a year.
The screen is now flush with the case and we’ve decreased the overall thickness to about 18 mm.
sentences.cn: 现在的屏幕已经和外壳在同一平面上，而且我们已经将总厚度压缩到18毫米。

sentences.en: The whole of the area has less than 250 mm rainfall a year.
sentences.cn: 这个地区一年降雨量少于250毫米.

sentences.en: Those places which have over 250 mm rainfall are near the Mediterranean Sea.
sentences.cn: 靠近地中海的地区降水量超过了250毫米.

sentences.en: We have full stereo sound, video, 35 mm slides.
sentences.cn: 我们有立体声、视频及35 毫米幻灯片。

trans.tran_cn: 唔，嗯（书写中表示同意、思考中、喜欢、犹豫等发出的声音）
